required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of Cabozantinib in Patients With Advanced, Low Proliferative NEN G3
clinical_study.official_title: CABONEN - A Phase II Trial of Cabozantinib in Patients With Advanced, Low Proliferative NEN G3

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this clinical trial represents the evaluation of efficacy of the tyrosine kinase inhibitor Cabozantinib in patients with NEN G3 with a proliferation rate of Ki67 20 - 60%.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the efficacy of Cabozantinib treatment via DCR after 6 months.
primary_outcome.description: Disease control rate (DCR) 6 months after treatment start .

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate short- and long term efficacy of Cabozantinib treatment via DCR.
secondary_outcome.description: DCR 3 and 12 months after treatment start.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate short- and long term efficacy of Cabozantinib treatment via ORR.
secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate (ORR) 3, 6 and 12 months after treatment start and best objective response rate.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate short- and long term efficacy of Cabozantinib treatment via PFS.
Evaluate short- and long term efficacy of Cabozantinib treatment via OS.
Assess quality-of-life during and after Cabozantinib treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: EORTC QLQ-C30 Quality of Life Questionnaire monthly for 12 months after treatment start and after 15 months. Different questions regarding Quality of Life on a scale of 1 - 4. The lower the numbers, the better the quality of Life.

other_outcome.measure: Safety of Cabozantinib via AE and SAE assessment.
other_outcome.description: Adverse events and serious adverse events will be assessed in contingency tables.

intervention.description: Cabozantinib is administered orally at the dose of 60 mg per day..
